price: "Waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni, kuma ba su gauraya ĩmãninsu da zãlunci ba, waɗannan sunã da aminci, kuma sũ ne shiryayyu."
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَلَمۡ يَلۡبِسُوٓاْ إِيمَٰنَهُم بِظُلۡمٍ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمُ ٱلۡأَمۡنُ وَهُم مُّهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna āmanū walam yalbisū īmānahum biẓul'min ulāika lahumu al-amnu wahum muh'tadūna
